pr_title: Remove JSSContextSpi for the time being

timeline.bodyText: LGTM, but could we put the /* and */ in separate lines so they don't disturb the code?
timeline.author: edewata

timeline.message:
Gate JSSContextSpi behind SSLEngine feature flag

Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

Gate JSSContextSpi behind SSLEngine feature flag

Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: The SSLEngine looks like a class name instead of variable name. I'd probably use something like USE_SSL_ENGINE. Regardless, this is just preference. The code looks good, feel free to merge.
timeline.author: edewata
